title: Client lag
body: Hello, I don't know what happend, when I made that League of Legends [ game ] not client to be like 150 fps on high graphics, my client start lagging so hard, the delay after pressing smth, it's like 20fps or less. In settings, low spec mode doesn't help. How can it be.. Game 150fps on high, Client >20fps. How can I fix it? thanks.

replies.body: The game itself may be taking up a lot of processing power.  You can also set the[ client to close during a match](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png), which should automatically relaunch after the game is over.  What exactly is lagging in the client, and is there anything that you're specifically using it for while in a match?

I don't using anything during match, after I make to close client during game after match it takes long to turn it on, something is wrong with client, because in match I don't have any problems, only in client, everything is really slow, delay after pressing buttons, press and only after 2 secs it opens, etc.

I think I'm getting confused by when you say client.  Do you mean that this is happening in your match?  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) during these games, and let me know what you find.
not in match, just client before match, for example it takes 10 sec to log in for me.. When i press play and chose mode, it takes 4-6 sec to load lobby
Sooo, can't even people from RIOT help?
